recipe.title: Pea-ka-boo Potato Baby Food (7+ Months) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 10 oz ; potato, washed, peeled and cooked ; (280 g)
6 oz ; zucchini, washed, peeled and steamed ; (170 g)
8 oz ; peas, washed and steamed ; (225 g)
water, can use breast milk or formula, if needed

steps.step: Boil or steam potatoes. Steam zucchini and peas. Allow to cool.
Add potatoes, zucchini, and peas to a blender or food processor. Blend very well.
Add water, breast milk or formula to create a more liquid consistency if needed.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add potatoes, zucchini, and peas to a blender or food processor.
Add water, breast milk or formula to create a more liquid consistency if needed.
Refrigerate up to 4 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.
